Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection across all cases
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that include SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is directly followed by SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that occurs before SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection compared to the frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection appears but is not followed by any reviewer agreement (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences that lead to a variant ending in SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that are part of variants with performance duration above the median
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection relative to SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that is eventually followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of variants in which SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is succeeded by at least one reminder activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurring after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in cases that ultimately result in acceptance (e.g., RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Ratio of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion across the entire log
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that precedes any reviewer decline (e.g., SW-Reviewer Declined or SW-Reviewer Unavailable)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Number of times SW-Initial Reviewer Selection appears in long-running variants (performance > 1,000,000 seconds)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities

Name: Percentage of cases containing SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that also contain SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that are followed within 7 days by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection per month to identify temporal patterns in reviewer assignment initiation
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
